ARABIC: لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَٰفٍ ثُمَّ لَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I will cut off your alternate hands and feet and then I will crucify every one of you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I will have your hands and feet on alternate sides cut off, and have you all crucified."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I shall cut off your hands and feet on the opposite sides, and then crucify you all.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I will cut off your hands and feet on the alternate sides and crucify you all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I swear I will cut off your hands and your feet from alternate sides and then crucify you all.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, I will cut off your hands and your feet from opposite sides, then I will crucify you all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, then will I crucify you all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I shall assuredly cut off alternately your hands and feet, then I shall crucify you all together.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Surely I shall have your hands and feet cut off upon alternate sides. Then I shall crucify you every one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I will cut off your hands and feet on alternate sides and then crucify you all!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely I will cut off your hands and feet on the opposite sides and thereafter I will crucify you all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Surely I will cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, and then I will surely crucify all of you.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Be sure I will cut off your hands and your feet on apposite sides, and I will cause you all to die on the cross."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely, I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, then I will crucify you all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I will cut off on opposite sides a hand and a foot, and then crucify you all'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides; then I will crucify you all.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides; then I will surely crucify you all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:124]   I shall assuredly have your hands and feet cut off on opposite sides, that is, the right hand and the left foot of every one, then I shall have every one of you crucified’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Surely I shall have your hands and feet cut off upon alternate sides) the right hand with the left leg. (Then I shall crucify you every one) on the river bank.
